name: Ghost Of The Fishman
description:
Survive for your life in this intense chase around toxic corridors...

Ghost of the fishman is a survival horror game set in an abandoned Russian science facility, haunted by one of their past experiments you must venture deep into the laboratory collecting forgotten artifacts while trying to stay alive from the ferocious Fishman .

Features

  • Spooky chase gameplay keeping you on the edge of your seat
  • Doom inspired graphics taking back to the days of the SNES and early 3D titles.
  • 4 zones each with different theming and halls to explore.
  • Atmospheric music and sound making you feel right in the action.
  • A crazy weird ending???? Guess you'll have to find out what that is.
